info.description: Workflow-history service provides historic details of processes, tasks or activities which are linked to the workflow service.
info.title: Workflow History REST API

parameters.description: An id of the activity instance.
parameters.name: activityId

parameters.description: An id of the historic activity instance.
parameters.name: activityInstanceId

parameters.description: The name of the historic activity instance.
parameters.name: activityName

parameters.description: The element type of the historic activity instance.
parameters.name: activityType

parameters.description: The execution id of the historic activity instance.
parameters.name: executionId

parameters.description: Indication if the historic activity instance is finished.
parameters.name: finished

parameters.description: The assignee of the historic activity instance.
parameters.name: taskAssignee

parameters.description: The process instance id of the historic activity instance.
parameters.name: processInstanceId

parameters.description: The process definition id of the historic activity instance.
parameters.name: processDefinitionId

parameters.description: Only return the activity instances in the current subscription
parameters.name: filterByCurrentSubscription

parameters.description: Indication to include OTDS Id instead of email for users in the response.
parameters.name: includeUserIds

200.description: Indicates that historic activity instances could be queried.

400.description: Indicates an parameter was passed in the wrong format. The status-message contains additional information.

parameters.description: An id of the historic process instance.
parameters.name: processInstanceId

parameters.description: A name of the historic process instance.
parameters.name: processInstanceName

parameters.description: A name of the historic process instance used in a like query.
parameters.name: processInstanceNameLike

parameters.description: A name of the historic process instance used in a like query ignoring case.
parameters.name: processInstanceNameLikeIgnoreCase

parameters.description: The process definition key of the historic process instance.
parameters.name: processDefinitionKey

parameters.description: The process definition id of the historic process instance.
parameters.name: processDefinitionId

parameters.description: The process definition name of the historic process instance.
parameters.name: processDefinitionName

parameters.description: The process definition category of the historic process instance.
parameters.name: processDefinitionCategory

parameters.description: The process definition version of the historic process instance.
parameters.name: processDefinitionVersion

parameters.description: The deployment id of the historic process instance.
parameters.name: deploymentId

parameters.description: The business key of the historic process instance.
parameters.name: businessKey

parameters.description: Only return instances with a businessKey like this key.
parameters.name: businessKeyLike

parameters.description: An involved user of the historic process instance.
parameters.name: involvedUser

parameters.description: Indication if the historic process instance is finished.
parameters.name: finished

parameters.description: An optional parent process id of the historic process instance.
parameters.name: superProcessInstanceId

parameters.description: Return only historic process instances which are not sub processes.
parameters.name: excludeSubprocesses

parameters.description: Return only historic process instances that were finished after this date.
parameters.name: finishedAfter

parameters.description: Return only historic process instances that were finished before this date.
parameters.name: finishedBefore

parameters.description: Return only historic process instances that were started after this date.
parameters.name: startedAfter

parameters.description: Return only historic process instances that were started before this date.
parameters.name: startedBefore

parameters.description: Return only historic process instances that were started by this user.
parameters.name: startedBy

parameters.description: An indication if the historic process instance variables should be returned as well.
parameters.name: includeProcessVariables

parameters.description: Only return the process instances in the current subscription
parameters.name: filterByCurrentSubscription

parameters.description: Only return process instances which are due on the given date.
parameters.name: dueOn

parameters.description: Only return process instances which are due before the given date.
parameters.name: dueBefore

parameters.description: Only return process instances which are due after the given date.
parameters.name: dueAfter

parameters.description: Only return instances with the given callbackId.
parameters.name: callbackId

parameters.description: Only return instances with the given callbackType.
parameters.name: callbackType

parameters.description: If true, empty values are ordered at top of list. If false, empty values are ordered at bottom of list
parameters.name: sortEmptyValuesOnTop

parameters.description: Indication to include OTDS Id instead of email for users in the response.
parameters.name: includeUserIds

200.description: Indicates that historic process instances could be queried.

400.description: Indicates an parameter was passed in the wrong format. The status-message contains additional information.

parameters.description: Indication to include OTDS Id instead of email for users in the response.
parameters.name: includeUserIds

200.description: Indicates that the historic process instances could be found.

404.description: Indicates that the historic process instances could not be found.

parameters.description: An id of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: taskId

parameters.description: The process instance id of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: processInstanceId

parameters.description: Selects the historic task instances for the process instance and its children.
parameters.name: processInstanceIdWithChildren

parameters.description: The process definition key of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: processDefinitionKey

parameters.description: The process definition key of the historic task instance, which matches the given value.
parameters.name: processDefinitionKeyLike

parameters.description: The process definition id of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: processDefinitionId

parameters.description: The process definition name of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: processDefinitionName

parameters.description: The process definition name of the historic task instance, which matches the given value.
parameters.name: processDefinitionNameLike

parameters.description: The process instance business key of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: processBusinessKey

parameters.description: The process instance business key of the historic task instance that matches the given value.
parameters.name: processBusinessKeyLike

parameters.description: The execution id of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: executionId

parameters.description: The task definition key for tasks part of a process
parameters.name: taskDefinitionKey

parameters.description: The task definition key for tasks part of a process
parameters.name: taskDefinitionKeys

parameters.description: The task name of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: taskName

parameters.description: The task name with like operator for the historic task instance.
parameters.name: taskNameLike

parameters.description: The task description of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: taskDescription

parameters.description: The task description with like operator for the historic task instance.
parameters.name: taskDescriptionLike

parameters.description: Select tasks with the given category. Note that this is the task category, not the category of the process definition (namespace within the BPMN Xml).
parameters.name: taskCategory

parameters.description: The task delete reason of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: taskDeleteReason

parameters.description: The task delete reason with like operator for the historic task instance.
parameters.name: taskDeleteReasonLike

parameters.description: The assignee of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: taskAssignee

parameters.description: The assignee with like operator for the historic task instance. This parameter works only with user emails.
parameters.name: taskAssigneeLike

parameters.description: The owner of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: taskOwner

parameters.description: The owner with like operator for the historic task instance. This parameter works only with user emails.
parameters.name: taskOwnerLike

parameters.description: An involved user of the historic task instance
parameters.name: taskInvolvedUser

parameters.description: The priority of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: taskPriority

parameters.description: Indication if the historic task instance is finished.
parameters.name: finished

parameters.description: Indication if the process instance of the historic task instance is finished.
parameters.name: processFinished

parameters.description: An optional parent task id of the historic task instance.
parameters.name: parentTaskId

parameters.description: Return only historic task instances that have a due date equal this date.
parameters.name: dueDate

parameters.description: Return only historic task instances that have a due date after this date.
parameters.name: dueDateAfter

parameters.description: Return only historic task instances that have a due date before this date.
parameters.name: dueDateBefore

parameters.description: Return only historic task instances that have no due-date. When false is provided as value, this parameter is ignored.
parameters.name: withoutDueDate

parameters.description: Return only historic task instances that have been completed on this date.
parameters.name: taskCompletedOn

parameters.description: Return only historic task instances that have been completed after this date.
parameters.name: taskCompletedAfter

parameters.description: Return only historic task instances that have been completed before this date.
parameters.name: taskCompletedBefore

parameters.description: Return only historic task instances that were created on this date.
parameters.name: taskCreatedOn

parameters.description: Return only historic task instances that were created before this date.
parameters.name: taskCreatedBefore

parameters.description: Return only historic task instances that were created after this date.
parameters.name: taskCreatedAfter

parameters.name: includeTaskLocalVariables

parameters.description: An indication if the historic task instance global variables should be returned as well.
parameters.name: includeProcessVariables

parameters.name: scopeId

parameters.name: scopeType

parameters.name: filterByCurrentSubscription

parameters.description: Only return historic process tasks that are not a subtask of another task.
parameters.name: excludeSubTasks

parameters.description: If true, empty values are ordered at top of list. If false, empty values are ordered at bottom of list
parameters.name: sortEmptyValuesOnTop
